title: [Npc Friends! Add-on]NPC朋友——你的世界不再孤独【1.12】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FHC红石 于 2019-8-12 15:12 编辑 

NPC朋友——你的世界不再孤独This is an addon that adds 6 new npc “Friends”, 3 boys and 3 girls.
This addon can be used as decoration of your maps or for an npc to accompany you where you go. Remember that the npc are friendly, as long as they are not attacked.这是一个添加了6个新的NPC朋友的Add-on，有3个男孩和3个女孩
NPC可以用于装饰你的地图，不论你去哪，都陪伴着你网站: CubitosMC 
作者: Andiuber
推特: @AndiuberOficial图片展示特性You can tame any npc by feeding it with a cookie.
Once tamed, they will defend you.
You can ride on a npc, which is not tamed.
NPC by default attack Zombies, Skeletons and Creepers.
You can name your npc “friends” and they will always be visible.你可以通过饼干驯服NPC
一旦NPC被驯服，他们就会保护你
你可以骑在NPC上，即使他没有被驯服
NPC在默认情况下会攻击僵尸、骷髅和苦力怕
你可以把NPC取名为“friends”，他们就会一直跟着你安装Once the file is downloaded, just click and Minecraft will automatically open and export. If you cannot open the file, you will need to download a file browser in the playstore.文件下载之后，只要点击后MC就会自动打开和导出文件。如果你无法打开文件，你需要去应用商店下载一个文件浏览器。How to install the addon in our worlds?
Download and install the McAddon
Activate both behavior and resource pack you installed in your world settings.如何安装在我的世界？
下载并安装McAddon，在游戏设置中激活你在世界中安装的材质包和行为包。下载支持作者请从adfly下载：
http://clesolea.com/3ljo
作者下载地址：
https://www.mediafire.com/file/9 ... riends.mcaddon/file
感谢森林蝙蝠对翻译提供的帮助
